modName: Smelt Tan and Craft Arrows More At Once
summary:
Smelt 20, 50 or 100 more ingots at once
Tanning 20 or 50 hides at once
Tanning 20, 50, 100 or 200 leather strips at once
Craft 24, 240 or 480 arrows at once
descriptionHtml:
This small simple MOD add recipes to smelter, tanning rack and smithing forge.
I am not a moder. I believe this mod conflict with mods that alter smelting, Tanning and
Smithing forge recipes.
 
There are three versions. None of them require Dragonborn or Dawnguard DLC’s
 
Version 0.1
Smelt 20, 50 or 100 ingots at once
You can now smelt 20, 50 or 100 ores at once to create the corresponding items.
 
DATE 2016-06-19

- ADDED SMELT 100 CORRUNDUM AT ONCE

Version 0.2 (as version 0.1 and also)
Tanning 20 or 50 hides at once
You can now tanning 20 or 50 hides at once to create leather
Tanning 20, 50, 100 or 200 leather strips at once
You can now tanning 20, 50, 100 or 200 leather at once to create leather strips

Version 0.3 (as version 0.2 and also)
Craft 24, 240 or 480 arrows at once
Arrow crafting was possible with Dawnguard DLC.
This version adds the option to Craft 24, 240 or 480 arrows of Daedric, Dwarven, Ebony,
Elven, Glass, Iron, Orcish or Steel, using the same materials as the options
within Dawnguard DLC. However, arrows like Dragonbone, stalhrim, nordic and
bolts are not added with this MOD since their added as items in their DLC’s.
This MOD doesn’t require Dragonborn or Dawnguard DLC.
Since this MOD adds recipes even for Crafting 24 arrows, in crafting options for all
the above, If you have Dragonborn or Dawnguard DLC, the options crafting 24
arrow will be double.
 
DATE 2016-08-08
